text:
My granny used to tell us: Root of violence OR Harmony for that matter usually associated GREATLY with 3 fundamental aspects. 
1.  Financial issue.
2. Health. (Family physical/. psychological well being.)
3.  Family bond/upbringing/  Environment.

Thus, when any 1 of these 3 factors emerged is likely to cause chaos.
Now, these 3 are happening at simultaneously. 
Together with movement confinement, it’s “adding fuel to fire”.
To overcome this is to keep oneself occupied with their respective activities. 
I switched my mindset to “Patience Reflection and self-cultivation”.
Whatever one may do, KEEP CALM & DO NOT THROW TEMPER. 
All will be well.

Cherish what we have, who we have. For if it is lost it will never be back, no point crying over spilled milk.

Cheers, Keep Strong and contented.
人生无常，知足常乐 也❤️
